personal.name: Moniruzzaman Rony
personal.aboutMe: I have almost 3 years of experience in programming sector, and have been working as A Fullstack developer. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular and Springboot applying good practices and development standards.

jobsExperience.Title: Fullstack Software Engineer
Description:
Developed a Dutch insurance company’s project which help to calculate building rebuild cost and
make 3D structure of this building ..
Technology using Java 11, Spring-boot, Angular 11,Angular Material, Three.js etc.

jobsExperience.Title: Fullstack Programmer
Description: Developed microservices architecture based software for Bangladesh Planning Ministry.
Technology using Java 11, Spring-boot, Angular 11,Angular Material, SSO, Eureka, spring cloud gateway etc.
Working Experience on Bangladesh Government’s Project
Maintain code using by GitHub,GitLab ,JIRA ,bit-bucket for each project.

jobsExperience.Title: Junior developer
Description: Coding of API requests with RxJS.
Technology using Java 8, Spring-boot, Angular 7,spring security and JWT etc.
Maintain accurate scheduling and meet object.

list.Title: AtMetax
list.Description: AtMetax is in charge of evaluating the cost of rebuilding structures that have been destroyed due to unforeseen circumstances and are covered by insurance.

list.Title: PPS and RMS of Integrated Digital Service Delivery Platform (IDSDP), Planning Division & Commission, Ministry of Planning.
list.Description: This project aims to follow up on and continue the activities of the Implementation of Digital ECNEC (IDE project) to address capacity building and efficiency enhancements within agencies, ministries, and the planning commission to evaluate, appraise, and monitor public sector projects.

list.Title: SWEPT
list.Description: At SWEPT, we make life easy by offering a convenient combination of home care and personal care services including Cleaning, Handyman, Pet Care, Lawncare, Grocery Delivery and Concierge service, all within one company. Our customers skip the hassle of coordinating and let SWEPT take care of everything!

list.Title: Retail Plus
list.Description: Retail Plus is simply an application that easily connect between Retailer and Company though online. Apps for retail businesses are a gold mine when it comes to improving shopping.There have also an admin panel which help to manage this app thought respected company.
